title: PM Narendra Modi speaks extensively on depression, says express rather than suppress to overcome it
text:
PM Narendra Modi speaks extensively on depression, says express rather than suppress to overcome it PM Narendra Modi speaks extensively on depression, says express rather than suppress to overcome it According to one estimate, more than 35 crore people suffer from depression. He further said that depression is not incurable. By: FE Online | New Delhi  34 PM PM Narendra Modi speaks extensively on depression, says express rather than suppress to overcome it. (PTI) 
The Prime Minister, Narendra Modi laid a lot of emphasis on health. Pegging it on 7th April, which has been declared as the World Health Day by the United Nations, he said the focus will be on depression, which is a new age disease. He pointed out that depression can be a root cause of many mental and physical ailments, just as diabetes can be the root cause of all sorts of diseases, depression too, destroys all our abilities to sustain, fight, to display courage and to take a decision. Your friends, family and surroundings all can prevent you from going into depression and if you, unfortunately have gone into it, they can also pull you out of it. 
According to one estimate, more than 35 crore people suffer from depression. He further said that depression is not incurable. There is a need to create a psychologically conducive environment to begin with.

The first mantra is expression of depression rather than suppression of it. Share openly what you are going through, he advised everyone. 
Friends, family and milieu can bring you out of depression. so he suggested that we should serve those who are sad and get over our depression. He suggested Yoga as another panacea for overcoming depression. 
He further said that UN has resolved to provide universal health coverage for all by 2030.
